moremousetweaks.name: MoreMouseTweaks
message.moremousetweaks.installCloth: Install Cloth Config API to access mod options
option.moremousetweaks.interactionRate.t: Reduce for faster operation, increase if you are experiencing packet rate issues
option.moremousetweaks.quickCrafting.too: Allow quick-crafting and quick-trading via right-click
option.moremousetweaks.qcOverflowMode.no: Quick-crafting will not be allowed beyond a full carried stack
option.moremousetweaks.qcOverflowMode.re: Quick-crafting excess will be placed in the crafting output slot
option.moremousetweaks.qcOverflowMode.in: Quick-crafting excess will be placed in the inventory, if possible
option.moremousetweaks.matchByType.toolt: CTRL-clicking will always match all items of the same type
option.moremousetweaks.typeMatchTags.too:
Items with any of the tags in this list will be matched by type when CTRL-clicking.
See %s for a list of tags
hotbarMode.moremousetweaks.split.tooltip: Hotbar will be treated as a separate inventory
hotbarMode.moremousetweaks.merge.tooltip: Hotbar will be treated as part of the main inventory
extraSlotMode.moremousetweaks.hotbar.too: Extra slots will be treated as part of the hotbar
extraSlotMode.moremousetweaks.merge.tool: Extra slots will treated as part of the main inventory
